multiplechoiceresponse.label: What are some advantages of TDD?

choicegroup.choice: A- It is used as a replacement to documentation TDD can be a good part of the documentation but it is not meant to replace documentation.
B- It reduce the amount of functional code What else
C- It ensures that the functional code respects the specifications What else
D- It allows to fail fast and detect issues in an early stage What else
E- It reduces the complexity of the code Well, this is not a direct impact of TDD but it can indirectly reduce the complexity by removing non needed code
F- A and E Not quite right
